channel.title: Please help quick:( servers gone down :(
channel.description:
i was editing npc's in autaspawn.cfg
then restarted server and getting this:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2004) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:573) at server.main(server.java:162) Connection from 90.190.218.91:59115 Connection from 81.132.0.109:52073 [client-1-Bwuk im l33t]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 16 ms]
[client-2-James]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 47 ms] Connection from 84.68.117.80:49516 [client-3-Terminator]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms] BANNING HOST 81.132.0.109 (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected 81.132.0.109:52077 BANNING HOST 90.190.218.91 (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected 90.190.218.91:59271 BANNING HOST 84.68.117.80 (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected 84.68.117.80:49521 ClientHandler: Rejected 90.190.218.91:59302 ClientHandler: Rejected 81.132.0.109:52085 ClientHandler: Rejected 81.132.0.109:52086[/code]
please help asap :( thanks

item.title: Please help quick:( servers gone down :(
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Snaz:

Because I moved and added like LOADS of npc’s and I was really pissed that I lost it all when i deleted like 20 unwanted npc’s :\

Tip: Always make an backup once you’ve finished coding something, make an rar file and keep it somewhere you can find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help quick:( servers gone down :(
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Snaz, post:13, topic:307884”]i didn’t want to restart coding my server from start again but… one little error has messed up 2 weeks of coding
restarted a new one with same source but using different home etc.

i’ve learned to back up before i edit now :rolleyes:[/quote]

Well, why not just re-extract your source then replace yout autospawn.cfg with the new one complie then put it up?

@off topic: Btw Check your PM.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help quick:( servers gone down :(
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:9, topic:307884”][quote author=`jeba link=topic=404017.msg2990913#msg2990913 date=1255286223]
In short, you fucked up. new NPC list and your all good.
[/quote]

Autospawn*.

Try downloading another source’s autospawn and edit it. :x[/quote]

^ or just re-dl the source you have. Really, how hard is it to think “Oh I must have messed up let me go re-dl a new autospawn.” I mean come on this is worse than spoonfeeding.

Read full topic
